Modul model
Package de.kaiser.model.style

Klasse ElementBlockStyleProperties

java.lang.Object
de.kaiser.model.style.ElementStyleProperties
de.kaiser.model.style.ElementBlockStyleProperties
Bekannte direkte Unterklassen:
BlockImageStyleProperties, LayoutTableStyleProperties, PartStyleProperties, SectionStyleProperties, TextBlockStyleProperties
public class ElementBlockStyleProperties extends ElementStyleProperties
Represents a set of style properties that can be applied to an element. This abstract class provides common properties related to spacing, indentation, padding, and borders.

  • Methodendetails

    • mergeWith

      public void mergeWith(ElementStyleProperties elemBase)
      Merges the properties from a base style into this style. Typically, properties from the base style are only applied if they are not already set in this style.
      Angegeben von:
      mergeWith in Klasse ElementStyleProperties
      Parameter:
      elemBase - The base style to inherit from. Can be null.

    • applyPropertiesTo

      protected void applyPropertiesTo(ElementBlockStyleProperties target)
      Helper method to apply all properties from this object to another. Used by the copy() method in concrete subclasses.
      Parameter:
      target - The object to apply the properties to.

    • copy

      public ElementBlockStyleProperties copy()
      Creates a deep copy of this style properties object. This is crucial to prevent style modifications on one element from affecting another.
      Angegeben von:
      copy in Klasse ElementStyleProperties
      Gibt zurück:
      A new instance with the same property values as this object.
